price: 17. Y creamos sobre vosotros siete cielos[650]superpuestos, y no Nos pasa inadvertido cuanto sucede en la creación.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ خَلَقۡنَا فَوۡقَكُمۡ سَبۡعَ طَرَآئِقَ وَمَا كُنَّا عَنِ ٱلۡخَلۡقِ غَٰفِلِينَ
footnotes: [650]  Ver la nota de la aleya 29 de la sura 2.

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: walaqad khalaqnā fawqakum sabʿa ṭarāiqa wamā kunnā ʿani al-khalqi ghāfilīna
